channel.title: python on Vandy Liu
channel.description: Recent content in python on Vandy Liu

item.title: Soccer games and Python
item.description: I’ve been playing soccer for the past 15 years of my life. I love everything about the game and I enjoy playing it a ton. After high school ended, there wasn’t much opportunity for me to play and I got caught up in a lot of other things like school and work. However, I started dropping in at this indoor soccer event every Thursday. Because I missed the registration date, I am not a registered player and can only play if there aren’t enough registered players willing to play that day.

item.title: Updating my NBA Project
item.description: Website In Action Click here to see it! If you haven’t seen my other blog post, make sure to read it first. In the past summer, when I was happy with my project, I decided to host it on heroku and github pages and leave it be until the season started. Once the pre-season started, I noticed a major problem: the boxscores did not update until the game finished.

item.title: Full Stack NBA Project
item.description: November 2, 2019 - UPDATED BLOG POST Website In Action Click here to see it! BoxScoreQ is a website to keep you updated on NBA games and their box scores quickly. Whenever I come home from work or school, I open up and see what NBA games I should tune in to. However, I would always want to look at the box score first to see if there is a particular game that might interest me like a game where Derrick Rose currently has 41 points or a game where Klay Thompson is 6-7 from 3 point range.
